3 #include "GoalChecker.hpp"
4 #include "GoalGenerator.hpp"
5 #include "GoalPublisher.hpp"

7 #include <memory>

9 const inline std::string SERVICE_NAME = "enable_following";
10 constexpr double LOGGER_MESSEGE_PERIOD = 20;
11 
12 ObjectFollowerCore::ObjectFollowerCore(std::unique_ptr<GoalChecker> goal_checker,
13  std::unique_ptr<GoalGenerator> goal_generator,
14  std::unique_ptr<GoalPublisher> goal_publisher)
15  : goal_checker_(std::move(goal_checker)), goal_generator_(std::move(goal_generator)),
16  goal_publisher_(std::move(goal_publisher)), nh_(), pnh_("~") {
17 
18  service_enable_following_ =
19  pnh_.advertiseService(SERVICE_NAME, &ObjectFollowerCore::enableFollowingCb, this);
20 
21  setParams();
22 }
23 
24 void ObjectFollowerCore::start() {
25  while (ros::ok()) {
26  try {
27  follow();
28  } catch (...) {
29  exceptionFilter();
30  }
31 
32  ros::spinOnce();
33  sleep();
34  }
35 }
36 
37 void ObjectFollowerCore::follow() {
38  if (not following_enabled_)
39  return;
40 
41  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped pose;
42 
43  pose = goal_generator_->lookupTransform();
44  goal_generator_->evalGoal(pose);
45  if (goal_checker_->updatePoseIfConsiderable(pose))
46  goal_publisher_->sendGoal(pose);
47 }
48 
49 void ObjectFollowerCore::sleep() const { goal_publisher_->rate_.sleep(); }
50 
51 bool ObjectFollowerCore::enableFollowingCb(std_srvs::SetBool::Request &req,
52  std_srvs::SetBool::Response &res) {
53  following_enabled_ = req.data;
54  ROS_INFO("Following set to %d", following_enabled_);
55  res.success = true;
56  return true;
57 }
58 
59 void ObjectFollowerCore::setParams() {
60  pnh_.param<std::string>("base_frame", goal_generator_->base_frame_, "map");
61  pnh_.param<std::string>("object_frame", goal_generator_->object_frame_, "object");
62  pnh_.param<double>("goal_dist_from_obj", goal_generator_->goal_dist_from_obj_, 0.5);
63 
64  pnh_.param<double>("range_diff_to_set_new_pose", goal_checker_->range_diff_to_set_new_pose_, 0.15);
65  pnh_.param<double>("angle_diff_to_set_new_pose", goal_checker_->angle_diff_to_set_new_pose_, 10.0);
66 }
67 
68 void ObjectFollowerCore::exceptionFilter() {
69  try {
70  throw;
71  } catch (tf2::LookupException &ex) {
72  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(LOGGER_MESSEGE_PERIOD, "Object frame not found: %s", ex.what());
73  } catch (tf2::TimeoutException &ex) {
74  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(LOGGER_MESSEGE_PERIOD, "Object frame lookup exceed it's time limit : %s",
75  ex.what());
76  } catch (tf2::ConnectivityException &ex) {
77  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(LOGGER_MESSEGE_PERIOD, "Object frame not connected to base frame !: %s",
78  ex.what());
79  } catch (tf2::ExtrapolationException &ex) {
80  ROS_INFO_THROTTLE(LOGGER_MESSEGE_PERIOD, "Latest tf is too old: %s", ex.what());
81  } catch (ros::Exception &ex) {
82  ROS_WARN_THROTTLE(LOGGER_MESSEGE_PERIOD, "ROS exception caught: %s", ex.what());
83  } catch (...) {
84  ROS_ERROR_THROTTLE(LOGGER_MESSEGE_PERIOD, "Unpredictable error, can't send goal");
85  }
86 }
